1211212.content: Obi-Wan woke with a start. All he remembered was checking a report on strange activity on a remote, supposedly abandoned research station. Apparently it was not as abandoned as he thought. As he focused on his surroundings, he realized he was suspended above the ground by some force. As he pondered this (and of course how he was going to get out of it), evil laughter reached his ears. It sent shivers down his spine. “Welcome to my research station, young Kenobi.” “What do you want with me?” he called back in a steady voice. Again, the chilling laughter. “Let us just say one of the more ‘interesting’ aspects of the force has a side efffect which I have never realized, which I would like to test. “You are young and strong, a perfect candidate.” Wondering what on Coruscant he could mean, Obi-Wan was unprepared for the bolt of bluish lightning that shot out of a dark area at him. He roared as it struck him. He had heard of Siths using this “force lightning,” though he had never seen it. He suddenly felt every muscle in his lean body clench violently. This forced another growl out of him. He then oddly felt them all loosen, them clench again. He realized, with shock, that they were growing before his very eyes. They would clench, then loosen and expand slightly. He began to feel less pain, and more power. As he became lost in this blissful agony, he fell to the ground on his hands and knees. He continued to expand as his tunic tore, leaving his powerful growing body exposed. He then suddenly felt the lightning stop coming. After recovering on the floor for a moment, he stood, sweat glistening on his large, meaty pecs and his powerful shoulder and arms.

142.content:
The small X-wing fighter flew past the last moon of Dagobah as entered into its atmosphere. A small light began to flash, indicating that the landing site was within the glide slope of the incoming aircraft, and that the pilot and co-pilot had to trim the airspeed in order to ensure a smooth landing.

“Alright! Reduce speed by thirty percent, Jake! Don’t make us come in too fast, or else we’ll end up landing in the middle of a swamp!” Luke ordered to his co-pilot, who happened to be his nephew and his apprentice.

“Gotcha, Uncle Luke!” the teenager replied, as he adjusted the controls. “Reduce speed by thirty percent, Artoo!” Jake Skywalker ordered his R2D2 unit, who was positioned behind him in the X-wing fighter.

The engines lowered their output as the small jet came in and prepared for landing.

“Ready for a great week of camping and training, champ?” Luke Skywalker asked the boy. Luke was now the Jedi Master, and he had taken the young boy under his wing so that he could teach him the ways of the Force by starting out on the planet where he had first met the great Jedi Master, Yoda, many years earlier.

“Yes, I can’t wait to get started, Uncle Luke!” Jake replied. Jake was fifteen years old; he was short with short, black hair.

The X-wing swooped down, scoped out the familiar landing site, and set down on the grassy field right near the edge of the swamp. Once the plane had landed, Luke and Jake allowed their canopies to raise up, so they could climb out and explore the planet’s surface.

“Wow! We’re here!” Jake smiled, as he removed his helmet and looked around.

Luke walked ahead of him, and headed towards a cavern, where he saw a faint, blue glow.

“Normally, I would set up a fire in here, but I just noticed this weird, blue light. I had never noticed that before. I wonder what it is.” Luke noted, as he entered the cavern and started walking towards the light.

“Is it dangerous?” Jason asked him.

“I’m not sure… I can’t remember this light being here last time I was here, which was a few years ago!” Luke responded.

When Luke walked a little further, he spotted a large rock, which was about five feet tall, which had a bright, blue sphere sitting on top of it. The sphere was glowing bright blue, and it was even humming!

“That sphere… It… It is powered by… The Force!” Luke noted. “I… I can feel it!”

“Really? Are you sure?” Jake wondered out loud.

“The Force is very strong in that sphere! It’s everywhere around us! It’s already surrounding our bodies!” Luke observed.

“Uncle Luke… Is… Is that good, or bad? Is it doing anything to us?” Jake wondered. “I’m beginning to feel warm all over…”

“I’m not sure what or how this will affect us… Come, let’s go back to the ship…” Luke remarked.

Luke and Jake then turned around and walked out of the cavern. They would set up camp, and prepare something to eat.

That night, they would already begin to notice some differences to their bodies…
142.title: Muscle inflation

choices: Jake makes his own muscles grow using the Force
1421.content:
Luke had set up a large inflatable tent next to the X-Wing fighter, which was big enough for bot him and Jake to sleep in. The Dagobah nights were hot and humid, so they would only sleep with cotton shirts, shorts, and sandals on. The planet was like a big, tropical rain forest, and since they were located near a swamp and right by a lake, drinking water was no problem, either.

That night, Luke had dozed off almost immediately, since he had to be awake to navigate the X-wing fighter, but Jake was able to sleep during the flight from the rebel base, so the teenage boy really wasn't all that tired. In fact, he lay awake, thinking about that weird, blue sphere that they had seen in the cavern.

Jake realized that his Uncle Luke wanted to be cautious, but still, he almost felt like he was drawn towards it. It almost appeared as if he was called to go near it. If the sphere was so strong in the Force, then why did he have to stay away from it? Maybe his Uncle was being too cautious! Jake slowly got up from his sleeping bag and walked out of his tent.

The young Jedi apprentice then took a small flashlight and walked towards the small cavern, which was only a few yards away from where they were. Again, as he approached the cavern, he spotted the strange, bright blue light coming from the cavern. The light just seemed too welcoming to him. He wanted to see what it was.

As Jake stepped into the cavern, he saw the bright light coming from the spehere, which rested on the pedestal. He no longer needed the flashlight, and turned it off. As he got closer, the light grew more intense! Then, when Jake was almost six feet away from it, a bright, blue flash of light suddenly emitted from the blue sphere, and struck Jake in the chest!

Jake just felt overwhelmed! He was overcome by an enormous surge of power! It was as if an enormous blast of The Force was being pumped into his body! In fact, his body was almost being levitated off the ground, as the beam from the sphere continued to charge the boy's body with the mysterious power. Jake didn't feel any pain or anything, but he could feel that his body was changing!

Suddenly, the beam of light weakened and the blue sphere had lost its glow completely. There was no beam of light, and the sphere was completely died out. Jake's body dropped to the ground, and the boy was unconscious. After a few minutes had passed, he woke up, in a daze, and he stumbled back to the tent. He felt tired and sweaty, but he also noticed that he seemed a little more muscular than before. His arms were thicker. His biceps were bigger. His quads and calves had inflated some. His chest had puffed out some. But, weirdest of all, he felt this strange, amazing power coarsing within him. Was that the Force?

Little did he know that he was endowed with the measure of the Force that was comparable to that of a Jedi Master... And he was only fifteen years old!
1421.title: Jake becomes a little more muscular than before

choices: Jake makes Luke's muscles even bigger at Sandooine
Jake grows some of the other Jedi trainees' muscles
14212.content:
Jake ran back to his tent and crawled under the sleeping back after his strange encounter in the cavern. Strangely enough, he felt stronger… faster… more powerful. Still, he ignored the feelings and drifted off into a deep sleep.

When Luke woke up a few hours later, he got dressed and started gathering some wood for a fire. When Jake heard that Luke was already up, he put on his robe and his boots, and came out of his tent. As he looked around, he saw that Luke had started a pile of firewood.

“Good morning!” Luke shouted, since he spotted Jake from a distance. “See if you can get a fire going! I’ll get some more firewood, Jake!”

Jake walked over to the stack of branches, which were tossed over a small fire-pit, dug in the ground. This was near the tent, overlooking the lake and the x-wing landing site. The teen boy knew that he had to take two sticks and rub them together in order to produce so much heat, that he would eventually start a fire. But… would there be another way to do it?

Jake felt strange… He felt different. There was something inside of him that told him that there was a better way to start a fire… Using the Force!

He walked over to the pile of branches and he raised up his right hand. He pointed his index finger at the fire-pit, and took a deep breath, thinking of nothing else but a nice, hot fire burning before him.

A bright, blue spark suddenly shot from the tip of his finger, like a bolt of lightning, and struck the branches on the ground… Instantly setting all of them on fire! In fact, the flame which ignited was huge!

“Whoa!” Jake gasped. “Did… Did I do that?” he wondered in disbelief.

Luke had just made it back to the campsite, when he spotted the large, burning flame.

“Wow! You got a fire going already?” He asked Jake. “You’re fast!”

Luke then took a small pan and heated up some beans and soup, while holding the pan under the flame. He made something to eat for himself and for Jake, and the two young men enjoyed a quick, small breakfast together, while sitting on two large tree stumps.

Once they were done, Luke lead Jake to a grassy area near the lake, where they were surrounded by several boulders and rocks, neatly placed in front of the x-wing fighter.

“Now, let’s practice the art of levitation!” Luke instructed. “Use the Force to raise these rocks!”

Luke used the Force to raise a few rocks off the ground, and to make them hover in mid-air, before setting them back down again.

“Think you can do that?”

“Umm… Let me try!” Jake smiled.

Jake looked around him and focused on everything in sight, using the Force to make every item in view to levitate a few feet off the ground. Suddenly, about a dozen rocks and boulders, including three very large boulders, began to levitate above the ground! Next, the tents began to hover in mid-air as well! Jake just grinned as he was able to make so many things hover in mid-air all at once!

Jake then turned towards Luke, who was completely slack-jawed, and made him levitate as well!

“Hey! Whooaaa! JAKE!” Luke shouted, as his boots left the ground.

Finally, Jake turned to the x-wing fighter plane, and concentrated on that, even while he was still maintaining his mental grip on all the other objects at the same time. The space-plane suddenly began to lift off above the ground, but without its engines running! The fighter then climbed higher and higher, as Jake willed it to swing around in a full one-hundred-and-eighty degree turn, so that the nose of the space craft was pointing to the other direction. Then, Jake decided to make the x-wing fighter slowly descend back to the ground, until the landing gear touched down on the grass. Lastly, Jake set down all the boulders, the tents, and he allowed Luke to land back on his feet before him!

“That… That was just amazing!” Luke stuttered, as he walked up to Jake. “You… The Force is very, very strong with you! How… How did you do that?”

Jake just shrugged.

“I just use the Force and it happens!”

“Yes, but… Nobody is THAT strong!” Luke wondered.

“I can use the Force to do many things. I can feel it. I think… I think I can even change things… I can even change people! I can change YOU!” Jake realized, as the extent of his powers became clearer to him.

“What are you talking about?” Luke asked him. “Are you that strong in the Force?”

“Sure! Look… Let me try something, Uncle Luke!” Jake smiled, as he stared at his favorite Jedi-uncle.

Suddenly, Luke felt a tingling sensation in his arms, specifically in his biceps. His muscles quickly began to harden as they slowly started to inflate with raw muscle! Luke couldn’t help but flex his arms as some unknown, invisible force seemed to be pumping more muscle into his biceps! He moaned with pleasure as he felt an amazing surge of physical strength coursing through his arms! It was as if he had just enjoyed many hours’ worth of grueling workouts in the gym! His biceps kept on growing bigger and bigger, until they were almost as large and as round as bowling balls!

“My arms! My muscles! What… How did you do that?” Luke gasped, as he flexed his huge biceps, much to Jake’s amusement.

“I did that, Uncle Luke! I can manipulate your muscles by way of the Force! Isn’t that awesome?” Jake replied with a grin. “It’s so easy!”

“Wow… I have to take you back to the Jedi Training Academy on Sandooine… You’re just like a Jedi Master! What happened to you? What did you do?” Luke asked his nephew.

“Well… I… Uhh…” was the boy’s answer.

“Did you go back to that cavern where that blue sphere was being kept?” Luke asked him.

“Yeah… I woke up last night… I went into the cavern and I got zapped by that blue sphere! I don’t know what it did to me!” Jake explained. “Why? Am I in trouble? Did I do something wrong?”

“Obviously, the sphere has passed on all of its powers to you! We’ll go get it and place it in a bag, and we’ll take it back to the academy so they can analyze it…” Luke suggested.

Luke and Jake then broke up their camp and they retrieved the sphere from the cavern. The sphere had lost all of its power, and it was like a dark rock. The two Jedi Knights then climbed on board of the x-wing fighter and took off, to Sandooine, where Jake was to be reunited with all his other Jedi trainees. The only difference was that this time, Jake was already a Jedi Master. He was looking forward to using his new powers to making some of his friends’ muscles grow, including those of Uncle Luke, who could always use some more muscle on his body!
14212.title: Jake makes Luke's muscles grow

As Jabba’s cronies led Han towards the chamber, he could guess what was going to happen. He was going to be frozen in carbonate again. As they threw him in however, he just had to yell out, “Want me as another wall ornament Jabba!? Because I’m not coming quietly!” The low voice of the Hutt drifted over (translated of course). “Han, Han, do you really think I am going to try that again? No, I need another servant. One to do the dirty work. And soon, you will fit the type well.” Han had no idea what Jabba meant. He wasn’t working for Jabba in a million years, and he may be fit, but he was by no means musclebound.

As he thought about this, a gas filled the chamber he had been thrown into. He still flinched, but it wasn’t cold. It seemed to strangely grab at him. He turned to the kaminoans and then said:

Adult Boba takes the reins in the Original Trilogy, as a bounty hunter hired to capture Han Solo, now donning an upgraded version of Jango's armor.

Or even more in this classic universe...
